_88LoyaltyProgram.description: Identifies a membership or loyalty program offered by the company by name of the program.

___primaryInd.description: When true, indicates this is the primary loyalty program and when absent or false, indicates this is not the primary loyalty program.

$eref.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

___codeContext.description: Identifies the source authority for the code.

$eref.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

___loyaltyLevel.description: Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.

___singleVendorIndGroupInd.description: Present and true Indicates the program is part of an alliance, otherwise it is a single vendor.

___id.description: A unique reference for a loyalty program within this message.

$eref.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32

___programCode.description: Identification of the loyalty program by code.
